mapper.select: SELECT post_id, post_img, title, TRIM(TO_CHAR(price,'99,999,999')) price, town_name FROM post_tbl22 p JOIN town_tbl22 t ON p.town_code = t.town_code WHERE p.user_id = #{user_id} AND p.post_status = #{post_status} ORDER BY p.post_id DESC

SELECT u.user_id, u.profile_img, u.nickname, e.review FROM end_deal_tbl22 e JOIN chatting_room_tbl22 c ON e.room_id = c.room_id JOIN user_tbl22 u ON c.buyer_id = u.user_id WHERE c.seller_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY e.deal_id DESC

SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, u.temperature, t.town_name, TO_CHAR(u.join_date,'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') join_date, u.profile_img FROM user_tbl22 u JOIN address_tbl22 a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN town_tbl22 t ON a.town_code = t.town_code WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}
